name: CrashLanded (Teh_Thanos)
description:
END GOAL

Keep the alien alive and learn as much as you can from him!

HOW TO PLAY

Use the right screen on the bottom to control the atmosphere. 

You can click on the research panel to open the research tree.

Exit menus with Esc.

BUDGET & SCIENCE POINTS

You can use your budget to by equipment and perform experiments.

Use the acquired science points to publicize your findings and get funding.

RESEARCH

  • The first column are the experiments 

  They cost money and make the alien more hostile. They give science points

  • The second one are the communication researches

 The cost money and give science points they also lower the alien's hostility

The third one is what every scientist live for! Publicizing research

  •  They cost science points but give funding. Unfortunately the alien doesn't really like it.

And last but not list the equipment upgrades

  • You need money to purchase them (allow time for delivery) but they unlock other researches
